wikipedia_page.main: Major-General John Sydney Lethbridge CB, CBE, MC (11 December 1897 – 11 August 1961) was a British soldier.

link_mentions.page: Index of World War II articles (J)

response: * Nemone Lethbridge (1932-present) Famous barrister and playwright. Daughter of John Sydney Lethbridge.
* Lieutenant-Colonel (temporary Brigadier) John Sydney Lethbridge, , (13389), Royal Engineers.

Lethbridge was born outside the UK in 1932. She was the daughter of John Sydney Lethbridge, an Indian-born British Army officer, and his wife Katharine Greville Maynard, who was also Indian-born. At eight years old, Lethbridge boarded at Sacred Heart Convent School in Chew Magna, Somerset.
